alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 8:31PM CST until January 02 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Kansas and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in Kansas, Johnson KS and Wyandotte. In west central Missouri, Jackson. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 831 PM CST, the public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leawood, Grandview, Prairie Village, Gardner, Merriam, Mission, Fairway, Mission Hills, Westwood, Westwood Hills, Mission Woods, Countryside, Roeland Park and Lackmans. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
